  • patterns.prototype

patterns.prototype

Prototype pattern utilities.

Helpers for cloning complex objects and registering reusable prototypes. Provides StructurePrototype, PrototypeRegistry and layout helpers to define common building configurations.

class patterns.prototype.LayoutPrototype(name, structures)

Bases: object

Prototipo de un layout completo (conjunto de estructuras)

Parameters:

  • name (str)

  • structures (list[Dict[str, Any]])

clone()

Retorna una copia del layout

Return type:

LayoutPrototype

get_structures()

Retorna lista de estructuras del layout

Return type:

list[Dict[str, Any]]

class patterns.prototype.Prototype

Bases: ABC

Interface for objects that can be cloned.

Implementations should provide a clone() method returning a copy of the object.

abstractmethod clone()

Retorna una copia del objeto

class patterns.prototype.PrototypeRegistry

Bases: object

Central registry for available prototypes.

Prototypes are stored by name and returned as clones to avoid accidental shared mutable state.

create_from_prototype(name, position, gameManager)

class patterns.prototype.StructurePrototype(creator, config)

Bases: object

Prototype for a structure with predefined configuration.

Stores a creator and a configuration dictionary used when creating a concrete structure instance.

Parameters:

config (Dict[str, Any])

Retorna una copia del prototipo

Return type:

StructurePrototype
